Numbered Cards with Right Border

Use this design feature when you need to build an ordered list of important items. For example, this configuration might work well for things like step-by-step how-to guides. As with other card configurations, when there is more than one card in a set, using single-color deep teal sets is the preferred style.

As with other card set options, these cards can be arranged in 1- or 2-column configurations. Shown on this page is the 1-column configuration, which is preferred because the 2-column option works best when the content of each card is of a similar length. Radically different content length can cause odd spacing in the 2-column configuration. To change the layout to a 2-column configuration, change "lg:grid-cols-1" to "lg:grid-cols-2" in the first div container of the set.

Style Note: The large numbers on the left tab of these cards must remain white in color. Learn how to change icons and icon color in this video tutorial!
